name: Synthsurf
description:
Synthsurf is a retro-futuristic rhythm game that takes you on a journey through a neon-lit world. 

With a distinct 80s aesthetic, the game challenges you to hit the right notes in time with the music 

as you surf through a virtual world of vibrant colors and electrifying sounds. 

Get ready to feel the beat and experience the ultimate synesthetic trip!

Caption: Use spacebar to change directions!

Music:

Digital Love - AlexiAction @Pixabay

Synthwave 80s - AlexiAction @Pixabay
